mutants.code:
import heapq

def max_playlist_pleasure(n, k, songs):
    songs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    max_pleasure = 1
    current_time = 0
    min_heap = []
    for (t, b) in songs:
        current_time += t
        heapq.heappush(min_heap, t)
        if len(min_heap) > k:
            current_time -= heapq.heappop(min_heap)
        max_pleasure = max(max_pleasure, current_time * b)
    return max_pleasure

def max_playlist_pleasure(n, k, songs):
    songs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)

    current_time = 0
    min_heap = []
    for (t, b) in songs:
        current_time -= t
        heapq.heappush(min_heap, t)
        if len(min_heap) > k:

        max_pleasure = max(max_pleasure, current_time * b)
    return max_pleasure

def max_playlist_pleasure(n, k, songs):
    songs.sort(key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    max_pleasure = 0
    current_time = 0
    min_heap = []
    for (t, b) in songs:
        current_time += t
        heapq.heappush(min_heap, t)
        if len(min_heap) > k:
            current_time -= heapq.heappop(min_heap)
        max_pleasure = max(max_pleasure, current_time * b)
    return max_pleasure
